title: Woman Cook

verbs: To prepare a meal or a single dish.
nouns: Person who cooks professionally for other people
A person whose profession is to prepare food for customers.
A person who prepares food for a living.
A professional who prepares food for consumption
Someone who cooks food
A cook is a person who prepares food for consumption.
A woman is a female human.
Female adult human
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female human.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)
Adult female human being.
A person whose profession is to prepare food for customers.
A chef is a person who is a highly skilled professional cook who is proficient in all aspects of food preparation.
The head cook of an establishment such as a restaurant.
The head cook of a restaurant or other establishment
Person working with cooking food at an advanced level
A professional cook
A cook who manages other cooks in an establishment such as a restaurant.
A professional proficient in all aspects of food preparation
A person that has prepared a meal.

description:
A woman responsible for food preparation wearing a white buttoned chef jacket and toque hat.

Usually shown with either a wooden spoon or a skillet frying an egg, though WhatsApp's design is holding a spatula.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman cook emoji presents a cheerful figure in a crisp white chef's hat and apron, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading. Her warm, inviting smile and focused gaze convey a passion for culinary arts, while the subtle reflections on her attire highlight the realistic lighting Apple is known for. This emoji, with its soft rounded edges, is perfect for sharing recipes, celebrating homemade meals, or expressing enthusiasm for cooking and baking on Apple devices.
